Name: Warbox Sandbox
About the game: Warbox Sandbox allows players to simulate battles between different factions from different eras - real and fictional. Participate in the battle directly as lone wolf or with a faction of your choice or watch the carnage unfold with the blood and gore settings turned to the max. While the game is in a completely feature complete and playable state don't expect it to stay the same - this is a growing and evolving game with an active community. New features, updates, and changes will always be around the corner! Active Ragdolls Gore and Dismemberment Custom Teams Tons of characters World War 2, Police, Gangs, Zombie, Knights, etc. Low poly graphics Lots of options Raving reviews by mobile players - imagine how much fun it'll be on your powerful PC!
